name: Tree Blight
languages: understands Common and Druidic but can't speak

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blight makes two Branch attacks and uses Grasping Root.

action.name: Grasping Root
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 17}, one Large or smaller creature the blight can see within 15 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target is pulled up to 10 feet straight toward the blight and has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns.
